OrgName: National Academy of Recording Arts & Sciences, Inc.
activities: With respect to personal information received from the EU, the National Academy of Recording Arts & Sciences (“The Recording Academy”) provides social networking services to help users network with other website users.  The Recording Academy does not own any of the information it processes on behalf of  its customer. All such information is owned and controlled by The Recording Academy’s customers.

recoursemech: National Academy of Recording Arts & Sciences, Inc. is committed to cooperating with Data Protection Authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
